# MES-Paint
Application for editing indexed PNGs palettes. Mainly used for the creation of MES textures.

## Install
`$ pip install mespaint`

## Usage
`$ mespaint`

- 8-color palettes
- any image to indxed png converter
- import and export palettes and images
